sacsshelper.keywords.description: Customize keywords and colors. Any css color identifier is valid.

color.description: The text color. Besides, you can play with all the string and boolean styling properties provied by VS Code API. See all available properties on VSCode doc DecorationRenderOptions section: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api

backgroundColor.description: The text background color. See all available properties on VSCode doc DecorationRenderOptions section: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api

overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the ruler mark on the scroll bar. Use rgba() and define transparent colors to play well with other decorations. See all available properties on VSCode doc DecorationRenderOptions section: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api

sacsshelper.keywordsPattern.description: Specify keywords via RegExp instead of `sacsshelper.keywords` one by one. NOTE that if this presents, `sacsshelper.keywords` will be ignored. And REMEMBER to escapse the back slash if there's any in your regexp (using \\ instead of single back slash)

sacsshelper.defaultStyle.description: Default style for all customized keywords
